entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 except 6 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2 except 6 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
